title: Fmr NY Rep. Joe Crowley, Trump Impeachment, Iran Special Rep. Brian Hook
itunes:title: Fmr NY Rep. Joe Crowley, Trump Impeachment, Iran Special Rep. Brian Hook
description:
Kevin discussed Democrats possible plans to move forward with impeachment procedings against President Trump, the prospects for passage of USMCA, and the 2020 Democratic presidential field with guests: Joe Crowley, senior policy advisor at Squire Patton Boggs and former Democratic Congressman from New York, Sery Kim, Republican Strategist and former Senior Advisor in the Trump Administration. Kevin also interviewed Brian Hook, United States Special Representative for Iran and senior advisor to Secretary of State Mike Pompeo about the Trump administration's decision to end waivers that let countries buy Iranian crude.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
